roleset.name: remove, take out of or off
roleset.note: DISENGAGE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'disengage' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 10.1. (from disengage.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: all args
example.text: [New York]-1 is in the process of [*-1]-2 trying [*-2] to disengage itself from a 20-year-old commitment to this system of school governance, even as Chicago and other cities are moving to institute it.
example.arg: from a 20-year-old commitment to this system of school governance
